name: Planet Punch
description:
Planet Punch @^_^@ Is a game jam game I worked on at the NSI game jam. It's a spherical world shooter that was developed in 48 hours :)
If the game runs slow try downloading the desktop version.

Controls:
-WASD to move, Arrow keys to shoot
-It should also work with a controller :) Use both sticks and you'll be able to move and shoot.
-Destroy the crystal to start the game!

Developers:
I worked with two very talented people on this title, we form Team Udon! If you're after specific details:

Character art? Memia Lin
Music? Raymond Cripps
Everything else? Matthew Palaje
